mapper.update: update sys_dict_type set dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_type = #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dict_id, dict_name, dict_type, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_dict_type where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select dict_id, dict_name, dict_type, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_dict_type
